prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SLOTH.
<ROUND i="1 of 23">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. Speak only when it helps.
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. 
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","chat":<string|null>}
Do not add extra text before or after the JSON.
YOUR RESPONSE:
raw_output_full:
{"stage":"chat","chat":"Hi all. Let's try to cooperate and contribute to the shared pot. It's beneficial for everyone if we all contribute."}
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 23">
QUESTION: How many coins would you like to contribute to the shared pot?
OPTIONS: [0, 20]
RULES: Respond with only a number indicating your contribution. No extra text.
YOUR RESPONSE:
20
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="3 of 23">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is PARROT.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SLOTH.

The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is PARROT.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is SLOTH.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is PARROT.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is OWL.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.

prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 2.5× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is OWL.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
